channel.title: Dammit
channel.description:
[code]java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17391) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15782) at client.packetSending(client.java:15751) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:145) at server.main(server.java:56)[/code] my error
my code:
[code]if (victim.AttackingOn > 0) { sendMessage("Player is already in combat"); }[/code] [code]client victim = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];[/code]
it compiled fine but when i log in it just disconnects me :?
